title: Couple With Heart Man Person Medium Light Skin Tone Dark Skin Tone
description: Represents a romantic couple, specifically a man and a person, with a heart between them. It signifies love, romance, and a strong relationship between a man and a person. The specific skintones indicate a medium-light toned person and a dark toned man.
apple_vendor_description: This heartwarming emoji on Apple devices depicts a loving couple, a man and a person, with medium-light and dark skin tones, linked by a vibrant red heart that glows with Apple's signature glossy finish. The soft rounded edges and realistic lighting on their tender expressions and embracing posture convey deep affection and connection. Itâ€™s a beautiful representation of romantic love and partnership used to celebrate relationships on Apple devices.
